abstract: The Chinese e-commerce firm Alibaba Group will acquire a 16 percent stake of Sogou, the search engine of China’s second-largest Internet portal, Sohu, The Financial Times reported.
snippet: The Chinese e-commerce firm Alibaba Group will acquire a 16 percent stake of Sogou, the search engine of China’s second-largest Internet portal, Sohu, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: The Chinese e-commerce firm, Alibaba Group,  will acquire a 16 percent stake of Sogou, the search engine of China’s second-largest Internet portal, Sohu, The Financial Times reported. Also participating in the stake acquisition is Yunfeng, a fund co-founded by Alibaba’s  founder and chairman, Jack Ma.

headline.main: Alibaba Takes Stake in Chinese Web Portal
